account_recovery_otl_verification_requir:
You should receive an email shortly with information on how to recover your account.
If you do not receive an email within a few minutes, please try again. You may now close this window.
account_recovery_username_required_text: Enter your username to reset your password or unlock your account.
assertion_required_consent_refuse_label: Unsupported authenticator or user refused consent
authentication_code_response_required_ms: Scan the QR Code displayed to finish authentication.
canceled_text: You have cancelled the attempt to recover your account. Please close this window.
challenge_response_required_text: The user's challenge response is required.
change_password_external_text: To change your password, please access the password management system.
completed_text: Congratulations! You have successfully changed your password.
current_credentials_required_text: Please enter your current credentials and authenticate with additional factors before changing password.
device_pairing_methode_required_text: Select the authentication method you want to pair with your account.
device_pairing_methode_required_btn_mobi: Use PingOne to receive push notifications.
device_pairing_methode_required_btn_totp: Use an authenticator app (like Google) to authenticate.
device_pairing_methode_required_btn_sms: Receive a text message with a passcode to authenticate.
device_pairing_methode_required_btn_emai: Receive an email with a passcode to authenticate.
device_pairing_methode_required_btn_key: Use a security key to authenticate.
device_pairing_methode_required_btn_plat: Use a fingerprint or facial scan to authenticate.
device_pairing_methode_required_btn_voic: Receive a phone call with a passcode to authenticate.
device_profile_session_id_required_text_: A Session ID cookie was not found. Please configure the risk adapter according to
This state is for mobile native applications that do profiling external to PingFederate.
device_selection_header_text_totp: Enter the passcode displayed in your app to complete authentication.
device_selection_header_text_passcode: Enter the passcode displayed in your app
device_selection_header_text_voice: Enter the passcode you heard to complete authentication.
device_selection_header_text_default: Enter the passcode that you received to complete authentication.
device_selection_required_text_1: To add a new authentication method you will need to authenticate with an existing method.
device_selection_required_text_2: Select the authentication method you want to use with your account.
device_selection_required_text_3: To add a new authentication method you will need to authenticate with an existing method.
email_activation_required_text_1: Enter the passcode that you received to complete the email pairing.
email_pairing_target_required_text: Enter the email you would like to receive authentication codes with.
email_verification_otp_required_text_1: A verification email was sent to
email_verification_otp_required_text_2: Please check your email and enter the security code here.
email_verification_otp_required_text_che: Please check your email and enter the security code here.
email_verification_required_text_1: A verification email was sent to
email_verification_required_text_2: Please check your email and follow the directions to verify your account.
email_verification_required_text_poll: Please check your email and come back here to continue.
email_verification_required_text_check: A verification email has been sent. Please check your email and come back here to continue.
external_authentication_required_text: Popup closed, do you want to cancel or try again?
id_verification_device_subtitle: If you are already on your mobile device, select This Device to open a web link on your mobile device to start the verification process, otherwise select the Other Device button.
id_verification_failed_subtitle_1: Please contact the support team and provide the information below, or please try again by selecting Cancel.
id_verification_failed_subtitle_2: Please contact the support team for more information, or please try again by selecting Cancel.
id_verification_options_text_1: Select a method to receive a web link on your mobile device to start the verification process, or select the QR Code button.
id_verification_options_text_infos: Update your account profile if you do not see the correct information.
id_verification_required_subtitle_1: We had a problem on our side. Scan the QR code using your mobile device's camera and compare the verification code to the one shown on your device. Select Cancel to send a web link via text or email.
id_verification_required_subtitle_2: Click on the web link sent to your mobile device or scan the QR code using your mobile device's camera. Compare the verification code to the one shown on your device.
id_verification_required_subtitle_3: Follow the instructions on your mobile device to complete the verification process. Scan the QR code to resume the process. Select Cancel to start over.
input_required_text_confirm_token: Confirm the authentication request displayed on your Entrust Mobile Soft Token Application.
input_required_text_approve_push: Approve Push Notification, then click Submit
input_required_text_confirm_credential: Confirm the authentication request displayed on your Entrust Mobile Smart Credential Application.
input_required_text_grid: Enter the response to the Grid Card challenge.
input_required_text_serial: Serial number of grid cards that can be used
input_required_text_email_otp: Enter the one-time password that was just sent to you.
input_required_text_sms_otp: Enter the one-time password that was just sent to you.
input_required_text_voice_otp: Enter the one-time password that was just sent to you.
input_required_text_token: Enter the one-time password generated by your token to complete the login.
mfa_setup_required_text: To enhance the security of your account, you will need to enroll in multi-factor authentication (MFA). You will receive security codes via email or text message that you will use to authenticate with.
must_change_password_subtitle: Please enter your current password and verify your new password.
new_password_recommended_subtitle_2: Would you like to change it now?
new_password_required_subtitle_1: Please enter your current password and verify your new password.
oauth_device_user_code_confirmation_requ: Confirm the activation code displayed on your device.
oauth_device_user_code_required_text: Enter the activation code displayed on your device.
one_time_device_otp_input_required_enter: Enter the passcode you heard to complete authentication.
Enter the passcode that you received to complete authentication.
one_time_device_otp_method_type_input_re: Select the authentication method you want to use with One-Time OTP authentication flow.
platform_activation_required_error_conse: Unsupported authenticator or user refused consent
platform_activation_required_follow: Follow the directions your browser provides to finish biometrics pairing.
recovery_code_required_subtitle: The user has selected to perform account recovery and a security code is required.
securid_credential_required_text_reset_f: PIN reset operation failed due to policy validation. Please try again.
securid_next_tokencode_required_text:
Wait until the tokencode (the number on your RSA SecurID token) changes, then enter the new tokencode.

Note: It might take a minute or more for the tokencode to change.
securid_reauthentication_required_text:
Please re-authenticate to complete your PIN reset.

Wait until the tokencode (the number on your RSA SecurID token) changes, then enter the new tokencode.

Note: It might take a minute or more for the tokencode to change.
securid_system_pin_reset_required_text_1:
Either you do not have a PIN yet, or the security policy requires a PIN change.

Your new RSA SecurID PIN is below.
securid_system_pin_reset_required_text_2:
IMPORTANT: Write down your new PIN. It will not be displayed again.

Press 'Submit' to activate the new PIN and continue to the re-authentication form.
securid_user_pin_reset_required_text: Either you do not have a PIN yet, or the security policy requires a PIN change.
security_key_activation_required_error_u: Unsupported authenticator or user refused consent
security_key_activation_required_follow: Follow the directions your browser provides to finish security key pairing.
sms_activation_required_text: Enter the passcode that you received to complete the text message pairing.
sms_pairing_target_required_text:
Enter the mobile number you would like to receive authentication codes
      with.
successful_password_change_text: Congratulations! You have successfully changed your password. Please use your new password to sign on again.
successful_password_reset_text: Your password has been reset. Please use your new password to sign on again.
totp_activation_required_subtitle: Scan the QR Code using your authenticator app, then enter the code displayed to finish.
username_recovery_email_required_subtitl: Enter your email address to receive an email with your username.
username_recovery_email_sent_subtitle: Thanks for your request. If your email address is verified, you'll receive an email with your username.
vip_authentication_required_subtitle: Enter a security code from your VIP credential or use one of the other mechanisms SMS, Voice and Push (if available) to proceed with authentication.
voice_activation_required_subtitle: Enter the passcode you heard to complete the voice pairing.
voice_pairing_target_required_subtitle: Enter the phone number you would like to receive authentication codes with.
index_pairing_msg: Enter the pairing key using your authenticator app, then enter the code displayed to finish.
index_scan_msg: Scan the code displayed to finish authentication.
index_select_method_for_weblink: Select a method to receive a web link on your mobile device to start the verification process.
error_pwd_change_msg: You have cancelled the attempt to change your password. Please close this window.
error_account_recovery_msg: You have cancelled the attempt to reset your password. Please close this window.
error_username_recovery_msg: You have cancelled the attempt to retrieve your username. Please close this window.
error_server_return_part_2: code. Please contact your system administrator.
error_api_challenge_required: PingFederate Authentication API Challenge response is required.
error_auth_url_must_be_string: authorizationUrl attribute must be a string.
error_oidc_auth_endpoint_must_be_string: oidcAuthnResponseEndpoint attribute must be a string.
error_methode_attribute_must_be_string: method attribute must be a string.
